unnormalised: Bhõvndi yetay mhunn chint’ta ani adresanchi chinta zata? Chintunk naka, *yaar*, hanv asa tumchea sangata! Online hotel book kortana, hanv sodanch Google Maps-acher address double-check korta. Kal hanv “Hotel Paradise, Near Railway Station, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302006” book kelem, punn “Near” mhonnllear khorench 3 km pois aslem! Vhodd *lolfail*.
normalised: Bhounvddi korunk yevzonni kortai ani patteancher stress yeta? Chinta korunk naka, yaar, mhaka tumchi chinta asa! Online hotelaam book kortana, hanv sodanch Google Maps-acher patto double-check kortam. Nimnnea vellaar hanvem "Hotel Paradise, Near Railway Station, Jaipur, Rajasthan teen xembhor ani don hozar ani so" book kelem, ten'na "Near" khorench teen kilometer pois asli! Major lolfail.

unnormalised: Ani, tim tras divpi booking confirmations ugddas dovrat? Tim address deets-an bhôrlele astat! Hotelacho address, kednaim travel agency-cho address zoso “MakeMyTrip, DLF Building 8, Gurgaon, Haryana 122002”, ani billing addresses-ui astat. Tim sovestha samballat, khas korun tumchea *auto-walla*-chea kodden marg darshakachi magnee keliar! Tankam ekdom "Landmark" zai.
normalised: Toxech, ti addchonnecheo booking confirmations ugddas dovrat? Te pattea details-amni bhorleat! Hotelacho patto, kednam kednam travel agencycho patto zoso ki "MakeMyTrip, D-L-F Building eight, Gurgaon, Haryana ek xembhor ani vis don hozar ani don", ani billing patte. Te sozdhe dovrat, khas korun tumi tumchea auto-wallak disha vichartalet ten'na! Tankam exact "Landmark" zai.

unnormalised: Ekdom mhonnllear, mhozo pro tip: Sodanch address copy-paste korat! Typos ghôddtat. Eka vellar hanv ek gift “22 B Baker Street, Kolkata, West Bengal 700001” haka pathoylem “22/B…”-achea bodlek. Dislem, tem lhan slash zaitench bodol haddta, lol. Bicharyak divortgeak koslem zalam astolem!
normalised: Exact vixim ulounk, mhozo pro tip: Sodanch patto copy-paste korat! Typos ghoddttat. Hanvem ek favtt "twenty two B Baker Street, Kolkata, West Bengal saat xembhor hozar ani ek" eka bhaddeak dhaddlem "twenty two slash B…" bodlek. Disun aylem, ti lhan slash ek vhoddlem ontor korta, lol. To gorib delivery munis!

unnormalised: Pro-tip tumi pavtlear, hotelachem sthaikank hotelacho address ani landmark thoddea sthanik bhaxent boroounk sang. Mhunn tumchea *rickshaw-walla*-nk tumchea hotelant vhorunk sangonk zai zalear, tumi tankam te dakhounk zatat! “Shanti Niketan Guest House, Sector 17, Chandigarh, 160017” Punjabi bhaxent utcharunk try korpachi kalpona korat!
normalised: Pro-tip tumi pavtoch, hotelachea staffak hotelacho patto ani landmark sthanik bhashent borounk sanga. Mhonnun tumkam tumchea rickshaw-wallak tumkam tumchea hotelaant ghevnk sangpak zai zalear, tumi tankam fokot dakhoitat! Kalpoonat korat tumi "Shanti Niketan Guest House, Sector seventeen, Chandigarh, ek xembhor ani saat hozar ani satra" Punjabi-nt utcharunk proitn kortai mhonn!

unnormalised: Nimannem, bhõvdichi booking shantichi asunk zai, tras divpi nhoi. Addressanchem thoddem prep work ani ek dasha umedin tumcho zaito vell vachoita! Khuxalkayechi bhõvndi, ixttanno! Tumcho *chai* visrunk naka!
normalised: Nimanneant, bhounvddichi booking relaxing asunk zai, stressful nhoi. Patteanchea sangata thodi prep work ani thoddi vinodi chitrvonn tumcho khoop vell sambhavta! Khuxal bhounvddi, ixtta! Tumchi chai visrunakat!
